item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #442】SRE 周刊第 #442 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: FireHydrant has acquired Blameless! The addition of Blameless’ enterprise capabilities combined with FireHydrant’s platform creates the most comprehensive enterprise incident management solution in the market. https://firehydrant.com/blog/press-release-firehydrant-acquires-blameless-to-further-solidify-enterprise/ SLO: Elastic vs Datadog vs Grafana Here’s a hands-on evaluation of the SLO offerings of three big players in the […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：FireHydrant 已收购 Blameless！ Blameless 的企业功能与 FireHydrant 的平台相结合，打造出了市场上最全面的企业事件管理解决方案。 https://firehydrant.com/blog/press-release-firehydrant-acquires-blameless-to-further-solidify-enterprise/ SLO：Elastic vs Datadog vs Grafana 以下是对 3 个大公司的 SLO 产品的实际评估这 […]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #443】SRE 周刊第 #443 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com I’m working on launching a new sibling project to SRE Weekly that will have a different format. I’m on the lookout for potential sponsors now, so if you’re interested, reply by email or drop me a note at lex at sreweekly dot com. And don’t worry! SRE Weekly itself is here to […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 我正在为 SRE Weekly 启动一个新的兄弟项目，该项目将具有不同的格式。我现在正在寻找潜在的赞助商，所以如果您有兴趣，请通过电子邮件回复或在 sreweekly.com 的 lex 上给我留言。别担心！ 《SRE 周刊》本身就是为了 [...]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #440】SRE 周刊 #440
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: Migrate off of PagerDuty, save money, and then have all of your configuration exported as Terraform modules? We did that. We know one of the hardest parts of leaving a legacy tool is the old configuration, that’s why we dedicated time to build the Signals migrator, […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：从 PagerDuty 迁移、省钱，然后将所有配置导出为 Terraform 模块？我们做到了。我们知道离开遗留工具最困难的部分之一是旧配置，这就是为什么我们花时间构建信号迁移器，[...]
